TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EndEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub EndEventHandler(ar As IAsyncResult)

span.span: The that is the result of the operation.

summary.span: 表示處理非同步事件 (例如應用程式事件) 的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles asynchronous events such as application events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個委派會呼叫事件來源時完成非同步作業以回呼至收到信號委派。This delegate is called by the event source when completion of the asynchronous operation is signaled by a callback to the delegate. 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用註冊為非同步頁面處理常式的委派。The following code example uses the delegate to register a handler for an asynchronous page. [!code-aspx-csharp[PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync/CS/pageaddonprerendercompleteasynccs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync/VB/pageaddonprerendercompleteasyncvb.aspx#1)]
